doc:
Bayn Johnson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bayn_Johnson 0 Bayn Johnson (born November 4, 1958) is a retired American actress, electric guitarist and singer. She may be best known as Kelly, the female blonde-haired band/group member of the Short Circus in seasons 3-4 of the PBS children's television series The Electric Company from 1973—75 when she was 14–16 years old. Bayn_Johnson ( born November_4_,_1958 ) is a_retired_American_actress , electric_guitarist_and_singer . She may_be_best_known as Kelly , the_female_blonde-haired_band/group_member of the_Short_Circus in seasons 3-4 of the_PBS_children 's_television_series_The_Electric_Company from 1973 — 75 when she was 14 – 16_years old .
